title: ANTIBELLUM: An Evening of Voodoo Noir, hosted by the Venice Supper Club
desc:
ANTIBELLUM: Voodoo Noir is a surreal, immersive experience blending theater, cuisine, mixology and social experimentation. ? ?? 
 
 "FULL EXPERIENCE"? RESERVATIONS INCLUDE: ?6 COURSE FINE DINING MEAL & DESSERT, WINE PAIRINGS, UNLIMITED COCKTAILS, FULLY IMMERSIVE THEATRICAL EXPERIENCE AND LIVE MUSIC. ? ?? 
 
 "ASCENDANT EXPERIENCE" RESERVATIONS INCLUDE FULL EXPERIENCE PLUS UNIQUE IMMERSIVE SURPRISES AND PERRIER JOUET BOTTLE SERVICE IN YOUR PRIVATE PENTHOUSE LOFT AFTER DINNER. 
 
 Location will be revealed through email the day before the event.
